meanings.sent1: She reoffered the toy to her little brother after he accidentally dropped it.
meanings.sent2: The store reoffered the sale on winter coats due to popular demand.
meanings.sent3: The magician reoffered the same card to the audience, pretending it magically changed.
meanings.sent4: The teacher reoffered the opportunity for extra credit, hoping students would take it this time.
meanings.sent5: The kind neighbor reoffered to help carry the heavy groceries into the house.

meanings.sent1: The reoffered gift brought a smile to her face as she unwrapped it again.
meanings.sent2: The reoffered proposal was met with enthusiasm by the committee members.
meanings.sent3: The reoffered movie tickets made for a delightful surprise on their anniversary.
meanings.sent4: The reoffered opportunity to travel abroad was too good to pass up.
meanings.sent5: The reoffered job offer came at just the right time for him to reconsider his options.
